TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Marshal extends System.Object
public ref class Marshal abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供了一个方法集合，这些方法用于分配非托管内存、复制非托管内存块、将托管类型转换为非托管类型，此外还提供了在与非托管代码交互时使用的其他杂项方法。

span.span: Provides a collection of methods for allocating unmanaged memory, copying unmanaged memory blocks, and converting managed to unmanaged types, as well as other miscellaneous methods used when interacting with unmanaged code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `static`上定义的方法类至关重要处理非托管代码。The `static` methods defined on the class are essential to working with unmanaged code. 此类中定义的大多数方法通常在开发人员想要提供的托管和非托管编程模型之间的桥梁。Most methods defined in this class are typically used by developers who want to provide a bridge between the managed and unmanaged programming models. 例如，方法将 ANSI 字符 （中托管的堆） 的指定字符串复制到非托管堆中的缓冲区。For example, the method copies ANSI characters from a specified string (in the managed heap) to a buffer in the unmanaged heap. 它还分配适当大小的目标堆。It also allocates the target heap of the right size. 公共语言运行时提供了特定的封送处理功能。The common language runtime provides specific marshaling capabilities. 有关封送处理行为的详细信息，请参阅[互操作封送处理](~/docs/framework/interop/interop-marshaling.md)。For details on marshaling behavior, see [Interop Marshaling](~/docs/framework/interop/interop-marshaling.md). `Read`和`Write`中的方法类支持对齐且未对齐的访问。The `Read` and `Write` methods in the class support both aligned and unaligned access. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用由定义的各种方法类。The following example shows how to use various methods defined by the class. [!code-cpp[Marshal#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/cpp/marshal.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Marshal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/CS/Marshal.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Marshal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/VB/Marshal.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时管理 COM 对象的引用计数，这样就无需直接使用此方法。The common language runtime manages the reference count of a COM object for you, making it unnecessary to use this method directly. 在极少数情况下，例如测试自定义封送处理程序，你可能会发现需要手动操作对象的生存期。In rare cases, such as testing a custom marshaler, you might find it necessary to manipulate an object's lifetime manually. 在调用，必须使用一种方法类似于递减引用计数。After calling , you must decrement the reference count by using a method such as . 不要依赖于的返回值，因为它有时会不稳定。Do not rely on the return value of , as it can sometimes be unstable. 你可以调用， ，或获取值，该值表示[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)接口指针。You can call , , or to obtain an value that represents an [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface pointer. 你还可以使用这些方法和方法要获取由托管的对象的 COM 可调用包装的 COM 接口的托管对象。You can also use these methods and the method on managed objects to obtain the COM interfaces represented by the managed object's COM callable wrapper. 如果你不熟悉此包装类型的详细信息，请参阅[COM 可调用包装](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)。If you are not familiar with the details of this wrapper type, see [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个两个内存分配中的 API 方法类。 is one of two memory allocation API methods in the class. (是另。)返回的初始内存内容是不确定，并分配的内存可能会大于请求的字节数。( is the other.) The initial memory content returned is undefined, and the allocated memory can be larger than the requested number of bytes. 此方法公开 COM [CoTaskMemAlloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148626)函数，称为 COM 任务内存分配器。This method exposes the COM [CoTaskMemAlloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148626) function, which is referred to as the COM task memory allocator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是中的两个内存分配方法之一类。 is one of two memory allocation methods in the class. (是另。)此方法公开 Win32 [LocalAlloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148628)从 Kernel32.dll 函数。( is the other.) This method exposes the Win32 [LocalAlloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148628) function from Kernel32.dll. 当调用`LocalAlloc`，它将传递`LMEM_FIXED`标志，这会导致分配的内存就地锁定。When calls `LocalAlloc`, it passes a `LMEM_FIXED` flag, which causes the allocated memory to be locked in place. 此外，分配的内存不是零填充。Also, the allocated memory is not zero-filled. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用 方法。The following example demonstrates calling the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 指示是否可以清除任何上下文中的运行时可调用包装器 (RCW)。

span.span: Indicates whether runtime callable wrappers (RCWs) from any context are available for cleanup.

returns.span: 如果存在任何可清除的 RCW，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if there are any RCWs available for cleanup; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有大量使用它可能需要很长时间来以进行清除的所有对象的深层依赖项关系图的托管和本机代码之间的引用。If there are a lot of references between managed and native code with deep dependency graphs it can take a long time for all the objects to clean up. 每次 GC 运行的时它将释放一定数量的 Rcw，这又会释放基础 COM 对象。Each time a GC runs it will free up some number of RCWs, which will in turn release the underlying COM objects. 这些 COM 对象将然后解除其托管的引用，并使更多的对象可用于清理下一次 GC 运行，这将启动过程重新。Those COM objects will then release their managed references and make more objects available for cleanup the next time a GC runs, which starts the process over again. 方法为提供一种应用程序以确定多少周期 GC。收集和 GC。WaitForPendingFinalizers 需要发生以清除所有内容。The method provides a way for the application to determine how many cycles of GC.Collect and GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers need to happen in order to clean everything up.

summary.span: 通知运行时清理当前上下文中分配的所有[运行时可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW)。

span.span: Notifies the runtime to clean up all [Runtime Callable Wrappers](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCWs) allocated in the current context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 互操作的系统抽取消息，同时会尝试清理 Rcw。The interop system pumps messages while it attempts to clean up RCWs. 有关单线程单元 (STA) Rcw 发生在所有应用程序，包括不足够经常执行抽取的应用程序，这可确保该清理。This ensures that cleanup for single-threaded apartment (STA) RCWs happens in all applications, including applications that do not pump often enough. 但是，某些应用程序执行操作进行了适当泵是对发送出现的位置非常敏感。However, some applications that do pump appropriately are very sensitive to where pumping occurs. 当互操作的系统中的位置时，意外，这些应用程序中抽取消息、 应用程序可能会遇到可重入性问题很难诊断。When the interop system pumps messages in these applications, in places that are unexpected, , the application can encounter reentrancy issues that are difficult to diagnose. 因此，应用程序需要能够控制其自己发送特定 STA 以及控制清理的 Rcw。Therefore, applications need to be able to control their own pumping for a particular STA and to control the clean-up of RCWs. 但是，开发人员通常只控制他们的应用程序中的线程的子集，因此不能确保所有线程泵适当地都处理。However, developers often only control a subset of the threads in their application and thus cannot ensure that all threads are pumping appropriately. 若要解决此问题：To solve this problem: 1. 使用方法来关闭对 Rcw 以及发生，基于每个线程的消息泵的自动清理。Use the method to turn off automatic cleanup of RCWs, and the message pumping that occurs, on a per-thread basis. 这允许开发人员选择退出自动清理和相应的消息泵处理。This allows developers to opt out of automatic clean-up, and the corresponding message pumping. 2. 使用方法，以通知运行时清理当前上下文中分配的所有 Rcw。Use the method to notify the runtime to clean up all RCWs that are allocated in the current context. 此助理方法允许开发人员能够精确地控制当运行在当前上下文中时执行清理。This companion method allows developers to precisely control when the runtime performs cleanup in the current context.

summary.span: 将数据从非托管内存指针复制到托管 8 位无符号整数数组。

span.span: Copies data from an unmanaged memory pointer to a managed 8-bit unsigned integer array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非托管、 C 样式数组不包含边界信息，这会阻止`startIndex`和`length`参数进行验证。Unmanaged, C-style arrays do not contain bounds information, which prevents the `startIndex` and `length` parameters from being validated. 因此，与对应的非托管的数据`source`参数填充托管的数组而不考虑其用途。Thus, the unmanaged data corresponding to the `source` parameter populates the managed array regardless of its usefulness. 调用此方法之前，必须初始化托管的数组用适当的大小。You must initialize the managed array with the appropriate size before calling this method. ## Examples 下面的示例将数组复制到非托管内存，然后将非托管的数组复制回托管内存。The following example copies an array to unmanaged memory and then copies the unmanaged array back to managed memory. remarks.format: ## Remarks 非托管、 C 样式数组不包含边界信息，这会阻止`startIndex`和`length`参数进行验证。Unmanaged, C-style arrays do not contain bounds information, which prevents the `startIndex` and `length` parameters from being validated. 因此，与对应的非托管的数据`source`参数填充托管的数组而不考虑其用途。Thus, the unmanaged data corresponding to the `source` parameter populates the managed array regardless of its usefulness. 调用此方法之前，必须初始化托管的数组用适当的大小。You must initialize the managed array with the appropriate size before calling this method.

Public Shared Function CreateWrapperOfType (o As Object, t As Type) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ CreateWrapperOfType(System::Object ^ o, Type ^ t);

param.name: o
param.span: 要包装的对象。

span.span: The object to be wrapped.

param.name: t
param.span: 要创建的包装器的类型。

span.span: The type of wrapper to create.

summary.span: 在指定类型的对象中包装指定的 COM 对象。

span.span: Wraps the specified COM object in an object of the specified type.

returns.span: 新包装的对象，该对象是所需类型的实例。

span.span: The newly wrapped object that is an instance of the desired type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将一个 COM 类类型，通常的基本转换`__ComObject`类型，对另一个 COM 类类型。 converts one COM class type, typically the base `__ComObject` type, to another COM class type. 输入的 COM 对象，由参数表示`o`，是[运行时可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)(RCW)。The input COM object, represented by parameter `o`, is a [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW). 同时`t`和`o`参数必须是其签名使用特性化的类。Both the `t` and `o` parameters must be classes whose signatures are attributed with . [Tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具将此属性应用为你导入类型库时。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool applies this attribute for you when it imports a type library. 如果你在源代码中手动创建 RCW，应将此属性应用到表示原始 coclass 以指示其 COM 来源的托管签名中。If you create the RCW manually in source code, you should apply this attribute to the managed signature that represents the original coclass to signify its COM origins. Tlbimp.exe 导入 COM[组件类](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/333d0904-ffa2-4d25-878d-7422bcd40582)作为托管的类和接口。Tlbimp.exe imports a COM [coclass](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/333d0904-ffa2-4d25-878d-7422bcd40582) as a managed class and an interface. 组件类接口具有与原始组件类，相同的名称和托管的类具有在原始的组件类名称后追加"类"。The coclass interface has the same name as the original coclass, and the managed class has the original coclass name appended with "Class". 例如，组件类调用`MyCoclass`将成为调用组件类接口`MyCoclass`和托管的类称为`MyCoclassClass`。For example, a coclass called `MyCoclass` becomes a coclass interface called `MyCoclass` and a managed class called `MyCoclassClass`. 由于`t`必须是类，而不是接口，请确保指定的托管的类 (`MyCoclassClass`) 并不是 coclass 接口。Since `t` must be a class, not an interface, be sure to specify the managed class (`MyCoclassClass`) and not the coclass interface. > [!NOTE] > 此时将失去的 COM 对象，因为新的 RCW 实例包装的输入标识[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)由原始 RCW 公开的指针。You lose the identity of the input COM object because a new RCW instance wraps the [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) pointer exposed by the original RCW.

[Tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具将此属性应用为你导入类型库时。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool applies this attribute for you when it imports a type library. 如果你在源代码中手动创建 RCW，应将此属性应用到表示原始 coclass 以指示其 COM 来源的托管签名中。If you create the RCW manually in source code, you should apply this attribute to the managed signature that represents the original coclass to signify its COM origins. Tlbimp.exe 导入 COM[组件类](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/333d0904-ffa2-4d25-878d-7422bcd40582)作为托管的类和接口。Tlbimp.exe imports a COM [coclass](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/333d0904-ffa2-4d25-878d-7422bcd40582) as a managed class and an interface. 组件类接口具有与原始组件类，相同的名称和托管的类具有在原始的组件类名称后追加"类"。The coclass interface has the same name as the original coclass, and the managed class has the original coclass name appended with "Class". 例如，组件类调用`MyCoclass`将成为调用组件类接口`MyCoclass`和托管的类称为`MyCoclassClass`。For example, a coclass called `MyCoclass` becomes a coclass interface called `MyCoclass` and a managed class called `MyCoclassClass`. 因为`T`必须是类，而不是接口，请确保指定的托管的类 (`MyCoclassClass`) 而不`coclass`接口。Because`T` must be a class, not an interface, be sure to specify the managed class (`MyCoclassClass`) and not the `coclass` interface. > [!NOTE] > 你将失去的输入的 COM 对象，标识，因为新的 RCW 实例包装[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)由原始 RCW 公开的指针。You lose the identity of the input COM object, because a new RCW instance wraps the [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) pointer exposed by the original RCW.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此方法以释放引用类型字段，如字符串的非托管结构。You can use this method to free reference-type fields, such as strings, of an unmanaged structure. 与其字段不同，结构可以是值类型或引用类型。Unlike its fields, a structure can be a value type or a reference type. 包含值类型字段 （所有本机结构中） 的值类型结构具有没有必须释放其内存的引用。Value-type structures that contain value-type fields (all blittable) have no references whose memory must be freed. 方法使用此方法来防止内存泄漏，当重新使用的结构占用的内存。The method uses this method to prevent memory leaks when reusing memory occupied by a structure. 调用 COM [SysFreeString](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148633)函数，从而，反过来，释放分配的字符串。 calls the COM [SysFreeString](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148633) function, which, in turn, frees an allocated string. 除了、类提供了两个其他内存释放方法：和。In addition to , the class provides two other memory-deallocation methods: and .

exception.span: 但请该用连续或显式布局。

summary.span: 通过将[运行时可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW) 的引用计数设置为 0，释放对它的所有引用。

span.span: Releases all references to a [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW) by setting its reference count to 0.

returns.span: 与 参数关联的 RCW 的新引用计数值，如果释放成功，则为 0（零）。

span.span: The new value of the reference count of the RCW associated with the parameter, which is 0 (zero) if the release is successful.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法释放 COM 对象的托管的引用。The method releases the managed reference to a COM object. 调用此方法等效于调用方法中的循环，直到它返回 0 （零）。Calling this method is equivalent to calling the method in a loop until it returns 0 (zero). 当上的 COM 对象的引用计数变为 0 时，是通常释放的 COM 对象，虽然这取决于 COM 对象实现，并且不受控制的运行时。When the reference count on the COM object becomes 0, the COM object is usually freed, although this depends on the COM object's implementation and is beyond the control of the runtime. 但是，RCW 可能仍然存在，等待进行垃圾回收。However, the RCW can still exist, waiting to be garbage-collected. 已从其基础 RCW 将其分隔后，不能使用的 COM 对象。The COM object cannot be used after it has been separated from its underlying RCW. 如果你尝试在 RCW 上调用方法后其引用计数变为 0，将引发。If you try to call a method on the RCW after its reference count becomes 0, a will be thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如和，你可以使用此方法释放内存。Like and , you can use this method to deallocate memory. 调用 COM [SysFreeString](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148633)函数，从而释放通过任何以下非托管方法分配的内存： `SysAllocString`， `SysAllocStringByteLen`， `SysAllocStringLen`， `SysReAllocString`， `SysReAllocStringLen`。 calls the COM [SysFreeString](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148633) function, which frees memory allocated by any of the following unmanaged methods: `SysAllocString`, `SysAllocStringByteLen`, `SysAllocStringLen`, `SysReAllocString`, `SysReAllocStringLen`. 例如，使用平台调用，你可以调用非托管的方法。You can call unmanaged methods such as these with platform invoke. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用非托管 DLL 函数](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For details, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用以释放分配任何内存， ，或任何等效非托管方法。You can use to free any memory allocated by , , or any equivalent unmanaged method. 如果`ptr`参数是`null`，该方法不执行任何操作。If the `ptr` parameter is `null`, the method does nothing. 公开 COM [CoTaskMemFree](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148638)函数，将释放所有字节，以便不再可以使用内存，`ptr`参数指向。 exposes the COM [CoTaskMemFree](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148638) function, which frees all bytes so that you can no longer use the memory that the `ptr` parameter points to. 除了、类提供了两个其他内存释放方法：和。In addition to , the class provides two other memory-deallocation methods: and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用以释放从全局堆分配任何内存， ，或任何等效非托管 API 方法。You can use to free any memory from the global heap allocated by , , or any equivalent unmanaged API method. 如果`hglobal`参数是方法不执行任何操作。If the `hglobal` parameter is the method does nothing. 公开[LocalFree](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148640)函数从 Kernel32.DLL，将释放所有字节，以便不再可以使用内存的指向`hglobal`。 exposes the [LocalFree](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148640) function from Kernel32.DLL, which frees all bytes so that you can no longer use the memory pointed to by `hglobal`. 除了、类提供两个其他内存释放 API 方法：和。In addition to , the class provides two other memory-deallocation API methods: and . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用 方法。The following example demonstrates calling the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Marshal#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/cpp/marshal.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Marshal#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/CS/Marshal.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Marshal#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/VB/Marshal.vb#4)] 下面的示例演示如何将托管的内容转换类到非托管内存并因而释放完成的非托管内存。The following example demonstrates how to convert the contents of a managed class to unmanaged memory and then dispose of the unmanaged memory when done. Public Shared Function GetActiveObject (progID As String) As Object

param.name: progID
param.span: 所请求的对象的编程标识符 (ProgID)。

span.span: The programmatic identifier (ProgID) of the object that was requested.

summary.span: 从运行对象表 (ROT) 获取指定对象的运行实例。

span.span: Obtains a running instance of the specified object from the running object table (ROT).

returns.span: 所请求的对象；否则为 。

span.span: The object that was requested; otherwise .

returns.span: 可将此对象转换为它支持的任何 COM 接口。

span.span: You can cast this object to any COM interface that it supports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开 COM [GetActiveObject](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221467\(v=vs.85\).aspx) OLEAUT32 的函数。DLL;但是，后者要求将类标识符 (CLSID) 而不是编程标识符 (`ProgID`) 应通过此方法。 exposes the COM [GetActiveObject](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221467\(v=vs.85\).aspx) function from OLEAUT32.DLL; however, the latter expects a class identifier (CLSID) instead of the programmatic identifier (`ProgID`) expected by this method. 若要获取不带注册的 COM 对象的运行实例`ProgID`，使用平台调用定义 COM [GetActiveObject](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221467\(v=vs.85\).aspx)函数。To obtain a running instance of a COM object without a registered `ProgID`, use platform invoke to define the COM [GetActiveObject](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221467\(v=vs.85\).aspx) function. 有关平台的说明调用，请参阅[使用非托管 DLL 函数](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For a description of platform invoke, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md). ## ProgID 和 CLSIDProgID and CLSID 注册表的 HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT 子树中的项中包含不同的子项的类型。Keys in the HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT subtree of the registry contain a variety of subkey types. 子项的大部分都是 Progid，映射到 CLSID 的用户友好的字符串。Most of the subkeys are ProgIDs, which map a user-friendly string to a CLSID. 应用程序通常使用这些用户可读的字符串，而不是数字的 Clsid。Applications often use these human-readable strings instead of the numeric CLSIDs. 通常，组件有映射到最新版本的系统安装的组件独立于版本的 ProgID。Often, a component has a version-independent ProgID that is mapped to the latest version of the component that is installed on the system. 应用程序和组件主要使用 Progid 检索其相应的 Clsid。Applications and components primarily use ProgIDs to retrieve their corresponding CLSIDs. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 Microsoft Word 的运行实例配置的计算机上运行。The following example was run on a computer that was configured with a running instance of Microsoft Word. 不没有运行 Microsoft Excel 的任何实例。There were no instances of Microsoft Excel running. 该示例通过调用两次。The example calls twice. 第一次调用尝试检索到的 Microsoft Word 实例的引用 (实例`Word.Application`对象)。The first call tries to retrieve a reference to an instance of Microsoft Word (an instance of the `Word.Application` object). 第二个调用尝试检索到的 Microsoft Excel 实例的引用 (实例`Excel.Application`对象)。The second call tries to retrieve a reference to an instance of Microsoft Excel (an instance of an `Excel.Application` object). 此代码已成功检索到的 Microsoft Word 实例的引用。The code retrieves a reference to an instance of Microsoft Word successfully. 但是，因为没有运行 Microsoft Excel，尝试检索第二个对象引发。However, because Microsoft Excel is not running, the attempt to retrieve the second object raises a . [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetActiveObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.marshal.getactiveobject/cs/marshal.getactiveobject.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetActiveObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.marshal.getactiveobject/vb/marshal.getactiveobject.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回表示指定的对象上请求的接口的接口指针。This method returns an interface pointer that represents the requested interface on the specified object. 如果你有一个需要传入的接口指针的非托管的方法，它将特别有用。It is particularly useful if you have an unmanaged method that expects to be passed an interface pointer. 使用此方法调用对象会导致要递增的接口指针上之前，则返回指针的引用计数。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 始终使用要完与指针后递减引用计数。Always use to decrement the reference count once you have finished with the pointer. 你必须遵守的规则定义供 COM 使用原始 COM 接口指针。You must adhere to the rules defined by COM when using raw COM interface pointers. 当调用的方法公开为 COM 对象参数时很有用类型，或与自定义封送。 is useful when calling a method that exposes a COM object parameter as an type, or with custom marshaling. 但通常不你可以在托管对象上使用此方法用于获取指向对象的 COM 可调用包装器。Although less common, you can use this method on a managed object to obtain a pointer to the object's COM callable wrapper. 例如，你可以使用托管对象导出到 COM，若要获取的接口指针上。For example, you can use on a managed object that is exported to COM to obtain an interface pointer for . 无法获取指向类接口的指针，因为类接口中没有要传递给第二个参数的相应类型 (`t`)。You cannot obtain a pointer to a class interface since a class interface lacks the corresponding type to pass to the second parameter (`t`). 请改用来调用 COM 可调用包装器，这通常是一个自动调度类接口的默认接口上的成员。Instead, use to invoke the members on the default interface of the COM callable wrapper, which is usually an auto-dispatch class interface. 方法重载默认情况下允许查询接口自定义。The method overload allows query interface customization by default. 若要指定是否将查询接口自定义项，请使用方法重载。To specify whether to apply query interface customization, use the method overload. 有关其他信息，请参阅[COM 可调用包装](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)，[运行时可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)，和[类接口简介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024)主题。For additional information, see the [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md), [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md), and [Introducing the Class Interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024) topics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回表示的接口指针`TInterface`指定对象上的接口。This method returns an interface pointer that represents the `TInterface` interface on the specified object. 如果你有一个需要传入的接口指针的非托管的方法，它将特别有用。It is particularly useful if you have an unmanaged method that expects to be passed an interface pointer. 使用此方法调用对象会导致要递增的接口指针上之前，则返回指针的引用计数。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 始终使用方法以递减引用计数，当指针用完。Always use the method to decrement the reference count when you have finished with the pointer. 你必须遵守的规则定义供 COM 使用原始 COM 接口指针。You must adhere to the rules defined by COM when using raw COM interface pointers. 当调用的方法公开为 COM 对象参数时很有用类型，或与自定义封送。 is useful when calling a method that exposes a COM object parameter as an type, or with custom marshaling. 你还可用于此方法对托管对象获取指向对象的 COM 可调用包装器，虽然这是不太常见。You can also use this method on a managed object to obtain a pointer to the object's COM callable wrapper, although this is less common. 例如，你可以使用托管对象导出到 COM，若要获取的接口指针上。For example, you can use on a managed object that is exported to COM to obtain an interface pointer for . 方法重载默认情况下允许查询接口自定义。The method overload allows query interface customization by default. 若要指定是否将查询接口自定义项，请使用方法重载。To specify whether to apply query interface customization, use the method overload. 有关其他信息，请参阅[COM 可调用包装](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)，[运行时可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)，和[类接口简介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024)主题。For additional information, see the [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md), [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md), and [Introducing the Class Interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024) topics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回此方法帐户为三个的从零开始的槽版本号[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)和可能的第四个[IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5)方法，使任一 3 的第一个可用槽的值或 7。The zero-based slot number returned by this method accounts for three [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) and possibly four [IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5) methods, making the value of the first available slot either 3 or 7. 提供的相反功能。 provides the opposite functionality of . 此方法可用于检索插槽编号不是从 COM 可见的接口的成员和私有接口的成员。You can use this method to retrieve slot numbers for members of interfaces that are not visible from COM and for members of private interfaces. 返回插槽编号对应于该类型已公开给 com。 如果将保留的 v 表编号The slot numbers returned correspond to the v-table numbers that would be reserved if the type was exposed to COM. COM 不可见成员实际占用公开 v 表中的槽，即使 COM 客户端无法使用该槽。COM-invisible members actually occupy a slot in an exposed v-table, even though the COM client cannot use the slot. 不能使用上通过传递的类接口从类。You cannot use on a class interface by passing from a class. 有关其他信息，请参阅[类接口简介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024)。For additional information, see [Introducing the Class Interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在版本 1.0 和 1.1 版.NET Framework 中，就可以传递一个表示到非托管代码的托管的方法，作为函数指针，允许非托管的代码调用托管的方法通过函数指针的委托。In versions 1.0 and 1.1 of the .NET Framework, it was possible to pass a delegate representing a managed method to unmanaged code as a function pointer, allowing the unmanaged code to call the managed method through the function pointer. 中，也可能会将该函数指针传递给托管代码中，返回的非托管代码和指针可以正确解析为基础的托管方法。It was also possible for the unmanaged code to pass that function pointer back to the managed code, and the pointer was resolved properly to the underlying managed method. 在.NET Framework 2.0 和更高版本中，你可以使用和方法进行封送处理在两个方向的委托。In the .NET Framework 2.0 and later versions, you can use the and methods to marshal delegates in both directions. 与，`ptr`作为导入。With , `ptr` is imported as a . A可以通过调用获取的托管委托和作为参数; 传递它然后，可以调用从非托管方法内。A can be obtained for a managed delegate by calling and passed as a parameter; it can then be called from inside the unmanaged method. 请注意参数封送处理程序可以还封送到的.NET Framework 2.0 和更高版本中的委托的函数指针。Note that the parameter marshaler can also marshal function pointers to delegates in the .NET Framework 2.0 and later versions. 方法具有以下限制：The method has the following restrictions: - 互操作方案中不支持泛型。Generics are not supported in interop scenarios. - 不能将无效的函数指针传递给此方法。You cannot pass an invalid function pointer to this method. - 此方法仅用于纯的非托管的函数指针。You can use this method only for pure unmanaged function pointers. - 你无法通过 c + + 或从获得的函数指针与使用此方法方法。You cannot use this method with function pointers obtained through C++ or from the method. - 此方法不能用于创建从函数指针到另一个托管委托的委托。You cannot use this method to create a delegate from a function pointer to another managed delegate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外设置[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)异常可以通过调用 COM GetErrorInfoNEEDGUID 函数获取的接口。 also sets up an [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface for the exception that can be obtained by calling the COM GetErrorInfoNEEDGUID function. 你可以使用此函数返回在应用的 COM 接口的托管的类实现上的 HRESULT 值属性。You can use this function to return an HRESULT value on a managed class implementation of a COM interface where you apply the attribute. 特性化的方法捕捉所有异常，并使用方法来返回适当的 HRESULT 值。Have the attributed method catch all exceptions and use the method to return the appropriate HRESULT value. 允许异常传播方法之外生成不正确的行为。Allowing an exception to propagate outside the method produces incorrect behavior. （事实上，公共语言运行时无法将异常传递给调用这种方法通过 v-表的 COM 客户端。）(In fact, the common language runtime fails to pass an exception to a COM client that calls such a method through a v-table.) 请注意，方法设置[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)当前线程的接口。Note that the method sets the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface of the current thread. 这可能导致意外的结果，方法等默认使用的方法[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)如果设置的当前线程。This can cause unexpected results for methods like the methods that default to using the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) of the current thread if it is set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须有目标函数`setLastError`元数据标志设置。The target function must have had the `setLastError` metadata flag set. 例如，`SetLastError`字段必须`true`。For example, the `SetLastError` field of the must be `true`. 设置此标志的过程取决于使用的源语言： C# 和 c + + 是`false`默认情况下，但`Declare`在 Visual Basic 中的语句是`true`。The process for setting this flag depends on the source language used: C# and C++ are `false` by default, but the `Declare` statement in Visual Basic is `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索与 Win32 错误代码使用相对应的 HRESULT方法。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve an HRESULT corresponding to a Win32 error code using the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在托管代码中，您很少直接处理`IDispatch`接口。In managed code, you seldom work directly with the `IDispatch` interface. 但是，时调用的方法公开为 COM 对象参数非常有用类型，或与自定义封送。However, is useful when calling a method that exposes a COM object parameter as an type, or with custom marshaling. 使用此方法调用对象会导致要递增的接口指针上之前，则返回指针的引用计数。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 始终使用要完与指针后递减引用计数。Always use to decrement the reference count once you have finished with the pointer. 你可以对托管对象使用此方法以获取指向对象的 COM 可调用包装器的接口指针。You can also use this method on a managed object to obtain an interface pointer to the COM callable wrapper for the object. 有关其他信息，请参阅[COM 可调用包装](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)。For additional information, see [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md).

summary.span: 返回由上一个非托管函数返回的错误代码，该函数是使用设置了 标志的平台调用来的。

span.span: Returns the error code returned by the last unmanaged function that was called using platform invoke that has the flag set.

returns.span: 通过调用 Win32 [SetLastError](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148656) 函数设置的最后一个错误代码。

span.span: The last error code set by a call to the Win32 [SetLastError](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148656) function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开 Win32 [GetLastError](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148657)从 Kernel32.DLL 函数。 exposes the Win32 [GetLastError](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148657) function from Kernel32.DLL. 此方法存在的原因是不安全直接进行平台 invoke 调用到`GetLastError`获取此信息。This method exists because it is not safe to make a direct platform invoke call to `GetLastError` to obtain this information. 如果你想要访问此错误代码，则必须调用而不是编写您自己的平台调用定义`GetLastError`并调用它。If you want to access this error code, you must call instead of writing your own platform invoke definition for `GetLastError` and calling it. 公共语言运行时可对覆盖的 Api 的内部调用`GetLastError`由操作系统维护。The common language runtime can make internal calls to APIs that overwrite the `GetLastError` maintained by the operating system. 你可以使用此方法以获取错误代码，仅当你将应用到方法签名和集字段`true`。You can use this method to obtain error codes only if you apply the to the method signature and set the field to`true`. 此过程会有所不同具体使用的源语言取决于： C# 和 c + + 是`false`默认情况下，但`Declare`在 Visual Basic 中的语句是`true`。The process for this varies depending upon the source language used: C# and C++ are `false` by default, but the `Declare` statement in Visual Basic is `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用 方法。The following example demonstrates calling the method. 该示例首先演示调用具有不显示错误的方法，然后演示调用的方法并显示错误。The example first demonstrates calling the method with no error present and then demonstrates calling the method with an error present. remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值可能为， ，或对象。The return value may be a , , or object. 返回的值取决于托管在给定的 COM 插槽中存在的成员的类型 (因此通用的返回类型所有三个派生)。The return value depends on the type of managed member that exists in the given COM slot (hence the generalized return type from which all three derive). 此方法返回的从零开始的槽数量的三个帐户[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)和可能的第四个[IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5)方法，使任一 3 的第一个可用槽的值或 7。The zero-based slot number that is returned by this method accounts for three [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) and possibly four [IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5) methods, making the value of the first available slot either 3 or 7. 提供的相反功能。 provides the opposite functionality of . 你可以使用和结合以传递指定的范围中的槽。You can use and in conjunction with to pass slots within a specified range. `memberType`参数是仅在返回重要。The `memberType` parameter is important only on return. 它包含的类型对应于返回的 COM 成员 （常规方法或属性访问器） 的对象。It contains the type of the COM member (a regular method or a property accessor) that corresponds to the returned object.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object GetObjectForIUnknown (IntPtr pUnk);
.method public static hidebysig object GetObjectForIUnknown(native int pUnk) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetObjectForIUnknown (pUnk As IntPtr) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ GetObjectForIUnknown(IntPtr pUnk);

param.name: pUnk
param.span: 指向 接口的指针。

span.span: A pointer to the interface.

summary.span: 返回一个类型实例，该实例通过指向 COM 对象的 [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) 接口的指针表示该对象。

span.span: Returns an instance of a type that represents a COM object by a pointer to its [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface.

returns.span: 一个对象，表示指定的非托管 COM 对象。

span.span: An object that represents the specified unmanaged COM object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会包装`IUnknown`托管对象中。This method wraps `IUnknown` in a managed object. 这相当递增 COM 组件的引用计数。This has the effect of incrementing the reference count of the COM component. 当运行时对托管对象，表示 COM 对象执行垃圾回收，引用计数将会减少。The reference count will be decremented when the runtime performs garbage collection on the managed object that represents the COM object. `pUnk`参数表示`IUnknown`接口指针; 但是，因为所有的 COM 接口直接或间接派生从`IUnknown`，可以将任何 COM 接口传递给此方法。The `pUnk` parameter represents an `IUnknown` interface pointer; however, because all COM interfaces derive directly or indirectly from `IUnknown`, you can pass any COM interface to this method. 返回的对象是[运行时可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)，公共语言运行时文件作为它来管理执行任何其他托管的对象。The object returned by is a [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md), which the common language runtime manages as it does any other managed object. 此包装器的类型通常为基准`System.__ComObject`类型，是使用包装类型不明确时的隐藏的类型。The type of this wrapper is often a base `System.__ComObject` type, which is a hidden type used when the wrapper type is ambiguous. 你仍可以对此类的基类的后期绑定调用，只要该 COM 对象实现[IDispatch](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5(vs.85))接口。You can still make late-bound calls to such a base type as long as the COM object implements the [IDispatch](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5(vs.85)) interface. 同样，您可以强制转换为适当的 COM 接口返回的对象。Likewise, you can cast the returned object to an appropriate COM interface. 要包装的对象使用特定的托管的类类型 （和不能是泛型包装类型），你必须遵守以下要求：For an object to be wrapped with a specific managed class type (and not a generic wrapper type), you must adhere to the following requirements: - 实现[IProvideClassInfo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148012) COM 对象的接口。Implement the [IProvideClassInfo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148012) interface for the COM object. - 注册具有包含程序集[Regasm.exe （程序集注册工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)。Register the containing assembly with the [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md). 或者，你可以避免这些要求，并仍获取具有特定的托管的类类型使用包装的对象方法。Alternatively, you can avoid these requirements and still get an object that is wrapped with a specific managed class type by using the method.

permission.span: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 原始指针到非托管的变体类型的 C 样式数组中返回对应托管对象的数组。 returns an array of managed objects that corresponds to a raw pointer to a C-style array of unmanaged VARIANT types. 公开给托管代码的变体类型时，interopmarshaler 执行相同的转换。The interopmarshaler performs the identical transformation when exposing a VARIANT type to managed code. 该方法将返回一个空数组时`cVars`参数为 0。The method returns an empty array when the `cVars` parameter is 0. 对象数组 （返回值） 获取垃圾回收像往常一样。The object array (the return value) gets garbage collected as usual. 不会释放非托管的输入的数组或输入数组中的各个变体。The unmanaged input array or individual VARIANTs in the input array are not freed. 因此它由你负责根据需要释放它们。Therefore it is your responsibility to free them as appropriate.

summary.span: 获取虚拟功能表（v 表或 VTBL）中包含用户定义的方法的第一个槽。

returns.span: 包含用户定义的方法的第一个 VTBL 槽。

span.span: The first VTBL slot that contains user-defined methods.

returns.span: 如果接口基于 [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)，则第一个槽为 3；如果接口基于 [IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5)，则为 7。

span.span: The first slot is 3 if the interface is based on [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003), and 7 if the interface is based on [IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的接口或类的从零开始的 v 表号。This method returns the zero-based v-table number for an interface or a class. 当在类上使用，则返回的槽编号引用类的类接口。When used on a class, the slot number that is returned refers to the class interface for the class. 如果此类接口是自动调度，则此方法始终返回-1 以指示仅支持调度的接口未公开 v-表向托管客户端。If the class interface is auto-dispatch, this method always returns -1 to indicate that the dispatch-only interface does not expose a v-table to managed clients. 你可以使用和结合以传递指定的范围中的槽。You can use and in conjunction with to pass slots within a specified range. 有关其他信息，请参阅[类接口简介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024)。For additional information, see [Introducing the Class Interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `t`参数必须是 COM 导入类型或子类型的 COM 导入的类型。The `t` parameter must be either a COM-imported type or a subtype of a COM-imported type. 此外，`t`必须是由其元数据导入的类型[Tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具。In addition, `t` must be a type whose metadata was imported by the [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool. 此类型必须是一个类和不是关联的组件类接口，这会带来的 COM 类的名称。This type must be a class and not an associated coclass interface, which carries the name of the COM class. 例如，如果 Tlbimp.exe 导入`Myclass`作为一个名为类`MyclassClass`和为组件类接口调用`Myclass`，必须使用`MyclassClass`(不`Myclass`) 使用此方法。For example, if Tlbimp.exe imports `Myclass` as a class called `MyclassClass` and as a coclass interface called `Myclass`, you must use `MyclassClass` (not `Myclass`) with this method. 有关导入的类和组件类接口的其他信息，请参阅[导入类型转换](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cb1ee67d-8ef0-4e40-b2a5-13714b9f33c3)。For additional information about imported classes and coclass interfaces, see [Imported Type Conversion](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cb1ee67d-8ef0-4e40-b2a5-13714b9f33c3). 如果已为获取了对象`pUnk`参数，`t`将被忽略并返回现有对象。If an object has already been obtained for the `pUnk` parameter, `t` is ignored and the existing object is returned. `pUnk` 表示[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)接口指针; 但是，因为所有的 COM 接口直接或间接派生从`IUnknown`，可以将任何 COM 接口传递给此方法。`pUnk` represents an[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface pointer; however, because all COM interfaces derive directly or indirectly from `IUnknown`, you can pass any COM interface to this method. 返回的对象是[运行时可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)(RCW)，公共语言运行时文件作为它来管理执行任何其他托管的对象。The object returned by is a [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW), which the common language runtime manages as it does any other managed object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回`true`如果实例的类类型使用特性化或如果它从使用特性化的类派生直接或间接。 returns `true` if the class type of the instance is attributed with or if it derives directly or indirectly from a class attributed with . [Tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具将此属性应用为你导入类型库时。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool applies this attribute for you when it imports a type library. 其他两种方法还确定指定的对象是否表示 COM 对象，但返回的要求`true`与不同，此方法的要求。Two other methods also determine whether a specified object represents a COM object, but the requirements for returning `true` differ from this method's requirements. 返回`true`如果类 （或接口） 使用特性化直接; 它不返回`true`供派生类型。 returns `true` if the class (or interface) is attributed with directly; it does not return `true` for derived types. 返回`true`如果类型使用特性化或派生自具有相同 GUID 的类型。 returns `true` if the type is attributed with or derives from a type with the same GUID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安装程序任务提供早期初始化和调用目标方法时将自动执行。Setup tasks provide early initialization and are performed automatically when the target method is invoked. 第一次任务包括：First-time tasks include the following: - 验证的平台调用元数据的格式正确。Verifying that the platform invoke metadata is correctly formatted. - 验证所有托管的类型都有效的参数的平台调用函数。Verifying that all the managed types are valid parameters of platform invoke functions. - 查找并加载到进程中的非托管的 DLL。Locating and loading the unmanaged DLL into the process. - 在进程中定位入口点。Locating the entry point in the process. 调用平台以外的方法上调用不起作用。Calling on a method outside of platform invoke has no effect. 若要执行安装程序在所有平台上的任务调用在类型中，使用的方法。To execute setup tasks on all platform invoke methods in a type, use .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法公开[iunknown:: Queryinterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) COM 对象，它会尝试获取特定的接口指针的方法。The method exposes the [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) method of a COM object, which attempts to obtain a specific interface pointer. 使用`QueryInterface`对 COM 对象是在托管代码中执行强制转换操作相同。Using `QueryInterface` on a COM object is the same as performing a cast operation in managed code. 使用此方法调用对象会导致要递增的接口指针上之前，则返回指针的引用计数。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 始终使用要完与指针后递减引用计数。Always use to decrement the reference count once you have finished with the pointer. 若要获取值，该值表示[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)的接口指针，可以调用， ，或。To obtain an value that represents a [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface pointer, you can call , , or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有隐含的偏移为 0。 has an implied offset of 0. 这种方法实现与非托管的 C 样式字节数组，不用复制整个的非托管的数组的直接交互 (使用) 到单独的托管数组，然后才能读取它的元素值。This method enables direct interaction with an unmanaged C-style byte array, eliminating the expense of copying an entire unmanaged array (using ) to a separate managed array before reading its element values. 支持从未对齐的内存位置进行读取。Reading from unaligned memory locations is supported. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的非托管内存块、 将一个字节写入的非托管内存、 从非托管内存读取字节，然后释放的非托管的内存。The following example creates a block of unmanaged memory, writes a byte to the unmanaged memory, reads the byte back from unmanaged memory, and then disposes the unmanaged memory. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte/vb/example.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来读取非托管的字符的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to read the value of an unmanaged character. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是中的两个内存重新分配方法之一类。 is one of two memory reallocation methods in the class. (是另。)重新分配的内存内容的开始位置等同于原始内容;但是，整个内存块可以在不同的位置。( is the other.) The beginning of the reallocated memory content is the same as the original content; however, the entire memory block can be in a different location. 此方法公开 COM [CoTaskMemRealloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148778)函数，称为 COM 任务内存分配器。This method exposes the COM [CoTaskMemRealloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148778) function, which is referred to as the COM task memory allocator.

(是另。)( is the other.) 此方法公开 Win32 [GlobalReAlloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148780)从 Kernel32.dll 函数。This method exposes the Win32 [GlobalReAlloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148780) function from Kernel32.dll. 返回的指针可以不同于原始文档。The returned pointer can differ from the original. 如果不同，已将原始内存块的内容复制到新的块中，和原始内存块已被释放。If it is different, the contents of the original memory block have been copied to the new block, and the original memory block has been freed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时管理 COM 对象的引用计数，这样就无需直接使用此方法。The common language runtime manages the reference count of a COM object for you, making it unnecessary to use this method directly. 此值仅用于测试目的。Use this value only for testing purposes. 在极少数情况下，例如测试自定义封送处理程序，你可能会发现需要手动操作对象的生存期。In rare cases, such as testing a custom marshaler, you might find it necessary to manipulate an object's lifetime manually. 仅程序该调用应调用。Only programs that call should call . 调用零的引用计数已达到后导致未定义的行为。Calling after the reference count has reached zero causes undefined behavior. 你可以调用， ，或获取值，该值表示[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)要释放的接口指针。You can call , , or to obtain an value that represents a [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface pointer to release. 你还可以使用这些方法和上要释放的托管对象所表示的 COM 接口的托管对象的方法[COM 可调用包装](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)。You can also use these methods and the method on managed objects to release the COM interfaces represented by the managed object's [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索`IUnknown`托管的对象使用的接口方法。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve an `IUnknown` interface for a managed object using the method. 该示例然后通过调用释放的接口指针方法。The example then releases the interface pointer by calling the method. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release/vb/example.vb#1)]

param.name: o
param.span: 要释放的 COM 对象。

span.span: The COM object to release.

summary.span: 递减与指定的 COM 对象关联的[运行时可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW) 的引用计数。

span.span: Decrements the reference count of the [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW) associated with the specified COM object.

returns.span: 与 关联的 RCW 的新引用计数值。

span.span: The new value of the reference count of the RCW associated with .

returns.span: 此值通常为零，因为无论调用包装 COM 对象的托管客户端有多少，RCW 仅保留对该对象的一次引用。

span.span: This value is typically zero since the RCW keeps just one reference to the wrapped COM object regardless of the number of managed clients calling it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于显式控制使用从托管代码的 COM 对象的生存期。This method is used to explicitly control the lifetime of a COM object used from managed code. 应使用此方法以释放及时必须按特定顺序释放对象时持有对资源的引用的基础 COM 对象。You should use this method to free the underlying COM object that holds references to resources in a timely manner or when objects must be freed in a specific order. 每次 COM 接口指针进入公共语言运行时 (CLR)，则将其包装在 RCW。Every time a COM interface pointer enters the common language runtime (CLR), it is wrapped in an RCW. RCW 具有即会递增每次 COM 接口指针映射到它的引用计数。The RCW has a reference count that is incremented every time a COM interface pointer is mapped to it. 方法递减引用计数的 RCW。The method decrements the reference count of an RCW. 当引用计数达到零时，运行时释放的非托管的 COM 对象上的所有引用，并引发如果你尝试进一步使用该对象。When the reference count reaches zero, the runtime releases all its references on the unmanaged COM object, and throws a if you attempt to use the object further. 如果相同的 COM 接口传递不止一次从非托管到托管代码，在包装上的引用计数是每次递增且调用返回剩余引用的数目。If the same COM interface is passed more than one time from unmanaged to managed code, the reference count on the wrapper is incremented every time, and calling returns the number of remaining references. 此方法使你可以强制将 RCW 引用计数的版本，以使其出现确切地说在需要时才到。This method enables you to force an RCW reference count release so that it occurs precisely when you want it to. 但是，错误地使用可能会导致应用程序失败，也可能会导致访问冲突。However, improper use of may cause your application to fail, or may cause an access violation. 请考虑到表示 COM 组件的 RCW 保存应用程序域中的托管的代码的方案。Consider a scenario in which managed code in an application domain is holding onto an RCW that represents a COM component. 如果调用在 RCW 上的方法，托管的代码将无法访问 RCW，并将引发异常。If you call the method on the RCW, the managed code will be unable to access the RCW and will raise an exception. 如果在释放 RCW 时正在执行对 RCW 的调用，则可能出现更严重的错误。A more serious error may occur if a call to the RCW is executing when the RCW is released. 在这种情况下，存在很可能进行调用的线程将导致访问冲突。In this case, there is a good chance that the thread making the call will cause an access violation. 但是，可能会损坏进程内存，并且该过程可能继续运行，直到非常难以调试的原因而失败。However, process memory may become corrupted, and the process may continue to run until it fails for reasons that are very difficult to debug. 这种风险变得非常复杂正在使用的 COM 组件是单一实例，原因如下： CLR 激活 COM 组件，通过调用 COM [CoCreateInstance](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=142894)函数，返回相同的接口指针每个出于 singleton COM 组件调用的时间。This risk is compounded when the COM component that is being used is a singleton, for the following reason: The CLR activates COM components by calling the COM [CoCreateInstance](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=142894) function, which returns the same interface pointer every time it is called for singleton COM components. 因此，应用程序域中的托管代码的独立的单独部分可以使用相同的 RCW singleton COM 组件，如果其中一个调用对 COM 组件的方法，另一个将成为中断。Thus, separate and independent pieces of managed code in an application domain can be using the same RCW for a singleton COM component, and if either one calls the method on the COM component, the other will be broken. 因此，使用仅当它是绝对必要。Therefore, use the only if it is absolutely required. 如果你想要调用此方法以确保在已确定时释放 COM 组件，请考虑使用方法相反。If you want to call this method to ensure that a COM component is released at a determined time, consider using the method instead. 将释放基础的 COM 组件，而不考虑其已重新进入 CLR 的次数。 will release the underlying COM component regardless of how many times it has re-entered the CLR. 每次 COM 组件重新进入 CLR 时，将按一个递增 RCW 的内部引用计数。The internal reference count of the RCW is incremented by one every time the COM component re-enters the CLR. 因此，您可以调用方法在循环之前返回的值为零。Therefore, you could call the method in a loop until the value returned is zero. 这实现相同的结果作为方法。This achieves the same result as the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法接受一个结构，它可以是引用类型或装箱的值类型的实例。This method accepts an instance of a structure, which can be a reference type or a boxed value type. 布局必须按顺序或显式。The layout must be sequential or explicit. 返回大小为非托管对象的大小。The size returned is the size of the unmanaged object. 一个对象的非托管及托管大小可能有所不同。The unmanaged and managed sizes of an object can differ. 对于字符类型，大小受值应用于该类。For character types, the size is affected by the value applied to that class. 你可以使用方法来确定非托管的内存量，以分配使用和方法。You can use the method to determine how much unmanaged memory to allocate using the and methods. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个托管的结构、 将其传输到非托管内存中，然后再传输回托管内存。The following example creates a managed structure, transfers it to unmanaged memory, and then transfers it back to managed memory. 此示例使用方法来确定分配多少非托管的内存。This example uses the method to determine how much unmanaged memory to allocate. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf/vb/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可自定义封送处理或供使用混合托管和非托管代码时。 is useful for custom marshaling or for use when mixing managed and unmanaged code. 通过调用此方法分配字符串所需的非托管的内存，因为始终释放的内存。Because this method allocates the unmanaged memory required for a string, always free the memory by calling . 此方法提供的相反功能。This method provides the opposite functionality of . 字符串的字符所复制为 ANSI 或 Unicode 字符，具体取决于执行代码的操作系统中。The characters of the string are copied as either ANSI or Unicode characters, depending on the operating system where the code is executing. 在 Windows 98 上为 ANSI 字符将复制的字符。On Windows 98, the characters are copied as ANSI characters. 在 Windows NT 4.0、 Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列，字符所复制为 Unicode 字符。On Windows NT 4.0, Windows 2000, Windows XP, and the Windows Server 2003 family, the characters are copied as Unicode characters.

.method public static hidebysig void StructureToPtr(object structure, native int ptr, bool fDeleteOld) cil managed
Public Shared Sub StructureToPtr (structure As Object, ptr As IntPtr, fDeleteOld As Boolean)
public: static void StructureToPtr(System::Object ^ structure, IntPtr ptr, bool fDeleteOld);

param.name: structure
param.span: 包含要封送的数据的托管对象。

span.span: A managed object that holds the data to be marshaled.

param.span: 该对象必须是格式化类的结构或实例。

span.span: This object must be a structure or an instance of a formatted class.

param.name: ptr
param.span: 指向非托管内存块的指针，必须在调用此方法之前分配该指针。

span.span: A pointer to an unmanaged block of memory, which must be allocated before this method is called.

param.name: fDeleteOld
param.span: 如果在此方法复制该数据前在 ptr 参数上调用 方法，则为 。

span.span: to call the method on the ptr parameter before this method copies the data.

param.span: 该块必须包含有效的数据。

span.span: The block must contain valid data.

param.span: 请注意，在内存块已包含数据时传递 可能会导致内存泄漏。

span.span: Note that passing when the memory block already contains data can lead to a memory leak.

summary.span: 将数据从托管对象封送到非托管内存块。

span.span: Marshals data from a managed object to an unmanaged block of memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`structure`是值类型，它可以装箱或取消装箱。If `structure` is a value type, it can be boxed or unboxed. 如果它进行装箱时，它是未装箱复制前。If it is boxed, it is unboxed before copying. 格式化的类是引用类型由指定其布局特性，为或。A formatted class is a reference type whose layout is specified by the attribute, as either or . 内容复制`structure`到预分配的内存块，`ptr`参数指向。 copies the contents of `structure` to the pre-allocated block of memory that the `ptr` parameter points to. 如果`structure`包含封送处理为 COM 接口指针的引用类型 (接口，而无需布局的类和)，托管的对象将保持活动状态与引用计数。If `structure` contains reference types that marshal to COM interface pointers (interfaces, classes without layout, and ), the managed objects are kept alive with reference counts. 所有其他引用类型 （例如，字符串和数组） 进行封送到副本。All other reference types (for example, strings and arrays) are marshaled to copies. 若要释放这些托管或非托管对象，必须调用方法之前释放内存块。To release these managed or unmanaged objects, you must call the method before you free the memory block. 如果你使用方法可在更高版本时，将不同的实例复制到的内存块指定`true`为`fDeleteOld`要删除的引用计数在以前的实例的引用类型。If you use the method to copy a different instance to the memory block at a later time, specify `true` for `fDeleteOld` to remove reference counts for reference types in the previous instance. 否则，不会有效地泄漏的托管的引用非托管的 typesand 副本。Otherwise, the managed reference typesand unmanaged copies are effectively leaked. 使用的总体模式如下：The overall pattern for using is as follows: 1. 在第一个调用方法后尚未分配的内存块的`fDeleteOld`必须`false`，因为没有要清除的内容。On the first call to the method after a memory block has been allocated, `fDeleteOld` must be `false`, because there are no contents to clear. > [!IMPORTANT] > 指定`true`为`fDeleteOld`仅块包含有效的数据的情况。Specify `true` for `fDeleteOld` only if the block contains valid data. 2. 如果将不同的实例复制到的内存块，并且该对象包含引用类型，`fDeleteOld`必须`true`要释放的旧内容中的引用类型。If you copy a different instance to the memory block, and the object contains reference types, `fDeleteOld` must be `true` to free reference types in the old contents. 3. 如果对象包含引用类型，则必须调用方法之前释放内存块。If the object contains reference types, you must call the method before you free the memory block. > [!NOTE] > 若要固定现有结构而不是复制它，请使用要创建结构的固定句柄类型。To pin an existing structure instead of copying it, use the type to create a pinned handle for the structure. 有关如何将固定的详细信息，请参阅[复制和固定](~/docs/framework/interop/copying-and-pinning.md)。For details on how to pin, see [Copying and Pinning](~/docs/framework/interop/copying-and-pinning.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个托管的结构，将其传送到非托管的内存使用方法，，然后将它传输回托管的内存使用方法。The following example creates a managed structure, transfers it to unmanaged memory using the method, and then transfers it back to managed memory using the method. summary.span: 将数据从指定类型的托管对象封送到非托管内存块。

span.span: Marshals data from a managed object of a specified type to an unmanaged block of memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式化的类是引用类型由指定其布局特性，为或。A formatted class is a reference type whose layout is specified by the attribute, as either or . 内容复制`structure`到预分配的内存块，`ptr`参数指向。 copies the contents of `structure` to the pre-allocated block of memory that the `ptr` parameter points to. 如果`structure`包含封送处理为 COM 接口指针的引用类型 (接口，而无需布局的类和)，托管的对象将保持活动状态与引用计数。If `structure` contains reference types that marshal to COM interface pointers (interfaces, classes without layout, and ), the managed objects are kept alive with reference counts. 所有其他引用类型 （例如，字符串和数组） 进行封送到副本。All other reference types (for example, strings and arrays) are marshaled to copies. 若要释放这些托管或非托管对象，必须调用方法之前释放内存块。To release these managed or unmanaged objects, you must call the method before you free the memory block. 如果你使用方法可在更高版本时，将不同的实例复制到的内存块指定`true`为`fDeleteOld`要删除的引用计数在以前的实例的引用类型。If you use the method to copy a different instance to the memory block at a later time, specify `true` for `fDeleteOld` to remove reference counts for reference types in the previous instance. 否则，会有效地泄漏的托管的引用类型和非托管的副本。Otherwise, the managed reference types and unmanaged copies are effectively leaked. 使用的总体模式如下：The overall pattern for using is as follows: 1. 在第一个调用方法后尚未分配的内存块的`fDeleteOld`必须`false`，因为没有要清除的内容。On the first call to the method after a memory block has been allocated, `fDeleteOld` must be `false`, because there are no contents to clear. > [!IMPORTANT] > 指定`true`为`fDeleteOld`仅块包含有效的数据的情况。Specify `true` for `fDeleteOld` only if the block contains valid data. 2. 如果将不同的实例复制到的内存块，并且该对象包含引用类型，`fDeleteOld`必须`true`要释放的旧内容中的引用类型。If you copy a different instance to the memory block, and the object contains reference types, `fDeleteOld` must be `true` to free reference types in the old contents. 3. 如果对象包含引用类型，则必须调用方法之前释放内存块。If the object contains reference types, you must call the method before you free the memory block. > [!NOTE] > 若要固定现有结构而不是复制它，请使用要创建结构的固定句柄类型。To pin an existing structure instead of copying it, use the type to create a pinned handle for the structure. 有关如何将固定的详细信息，请参阅[复制和固定](~/docs/framework/interop/copying-and-pinning.md)。For details on how to pin, see [Copying and Pinning](~/docs/framework/interop/copying-and-pinning.md).

.method public static hidebysig void ThrowExceptionForHR(int32 errorCode) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ThrowExceptionForHR (errorCode As Integer)

param.name: errorCode
param.span: 与所需异常相对应的 HRESULT。

summary.span: 用特定的失败 HRESULT 值引发异常。

span.span: Throws an exception with a specific failure HRESULT value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建指定的失败 HRESULT 的异常对象。This method creates an exception object for the specified failure HRESULT. 如果 HRESULT 为 0 或正数 （成功代码），该方法将返回而不创建或引发异常。If the HRESULT is 0 or positive (a success code), the method returns without creating or throwing an exception. 请注意，方法返回基于异常[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)如果已设置的当前线程的接口。Note that the method returns an exception based on the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface of the current thread if one is set. 在此情况下，`errorCode`参数将被忽略。When this happens, the `errorCode` parameter is ignored. 某些失败的 Hresult 映射到定义异常，而有些却不。Some failure HRESULTs map to defined exceptions, whereas others do not. 如果 HRESULT 映射到已定义的异常，创建异常的实例并引发它。If the HRESULT maps to a defined exception, creates an instance of the exception and throws it. 否则，它创建的实例，初始化错误代码字段，HRESULT，并会引发该异常。Otherwise, it creates an instance of , initializes the error code field with the HRESULT, and throws that exception. 当是调用，它将尝试通过使用非托管检索有关错误的额外信息[GetErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221032\(v=vs.85\).aspx)函数。When is invoked, it attempts to retrieve extra information regarding the error by using the unmanaged [GetErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221032\(v=vs.85\).aspx) function. 从每个 HRESULT 到其.NET Framework 中的相似异常类的映射，请参阅[如何： 映射 Hresult 和异常](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For the mapping from each HRESULT to its comparable exception class in the .NET Framework, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md). 有时，可能从以前的 COM 调用返回一个异常。Occasionally, might return an exception from a previous COM call. 在这种情况下，你可以使用以下解决方法，并将传递`IntPtr(-1)`第二个参数 (`errorInfo`):In this case, you can use the following workaround and pass `IntPtr(-1)` as the second parameter (`errorInfo`): ``` [SecurityPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.LinkDemand, Flags = SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode)] public static void ThrowExceptionForHR(interrorCode,IntPtrerrorInfo) ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建指定的失败 HRESULT 的异常对象。This method creates an exception object for the specified failure HRESULT. 如果 HRESULT 为 0 或正数 （成功代码），该方法将返回而不创建或引发异常。If the HRESULT is 0 or positive (a success code), the method returns without creating or throwing an exception. 方法将释放`errorInfo`参数，减少 COM 引用的计数[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)接口。The method releases the `errorInfo` parameter, decreasing the COM reference count of the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface. 请注意，方法返回基于异常[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)如果已设置的当前线程的接口。Note that the method returns an exception based on the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface of the current thread if one is set. 在此情况下，`errorCode`参数将被忽略。When this happens, the `errorCode` parameter is ignored. 某些失败的 Hresult 映射到定义异常，而有些却不。Some failure HRESULTs map to defined exceptions, whereas others do not. 如果 HRESULT 映射到已定义的异常，创建异常的实例并引发它。If the HRESULT maps to a defined exception, creates an instance of the exception and throws it. 否则，它创建的实例，初始化错误代码字段，HRESULT，并会引发该异常。Otherwise, it creates an instance of , initializes the error code field with the HRESULT, and throws that exception. `errorInfo`参数用于检索有关错误的额外信息。The `errorInfo` parameter is used to retrieve extra information regarding the error. 从每个 HRESULT 到其.NET Framework 中的相似异常类的映射，请参阅[如何： 映射 Hresult 和异常](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For the mapping from each HRESULT to its comparable exception class in the .NET Framework, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).

span.span: Writes a 64-bit signed integer value to unmanaged memory at a specified offset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使你能够直接与不用复制整个的非托管的数组的非托管 64 位有符号数组的交互 (使用) 到之前设置它的元素值的单独托管数组。 enables direct interaction with an unmanaged 64-bit signed array, eliminating the expense of copying an entire unmanaged array (using ) to a separate managed array before setting its element values. 支持写入未对齐的内存位置。Writing to unaligned memory locations is supported.
